response.original_title: I Love Lucy: A Colorized Celebration
response.overview: "I Love Lucy: A Colorized Celebration" is a TV program that features colorized versions of classic "I Love Lucy" episodes. It's a special presentation where some of the most beloved episodes of the show are brought to life with color, offering a fresh look at the iconic series.  The program includes a collection of five uncut, full-length colorized episodes. Some of the episodes featured in the colorized celebration include "Pioneer Women," "Lucy Does a TV Commercial," "Job Switching," "The Million Dollar Idea," and "Bonus Bucks
response.tagline: "Once in his life, every man is entitled to fall madly in love with a gorgeous redhead." Fall in love with Lucille Ball all over again!
response.title: I Love Lucy: A Colorized Celebration
